H0.text: Exothermic reactions are the type of chemical reactions that release energy.

H1.text: Sulfuric reactions are the type of chemical reactions that release energy.

H2.text: Endothermic reactions are the type of chemical reactions that release energy.

H3.text: Biochemical reactions are the type of chemical reactions that release energy.

A4.text: If the energy of the forming bonds is greater than the energy of the breaking bonds, then energy is released.

A5.text: If more energy is needed to break the bonds than the energy being released, energy is taken up.
